metadata.title: CVE-2021-22096 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Spring Framework versions 5.3.0 - 5.3.10, 5.2.0 - 5.2.17, and older unsupported versions, it is possible for a user to provide malicious input to cause the insertion of additional log entries.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
